name: toggle-scroll-bars-visibility
title: Toggle Scroll Bars Visibility
description: Change scroll bars visibility in macOS.
author: danulqua

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Toggle Scroll Bars Visibility
commands.description: Toggles scroll bars visibility between "Automatic" and "Always".

commands.name: set-when-scrolling
commands.title: Set Scroll Bars Visibility To "When Scrolling"
commands.description: Sets scroll bars visibility to "When Scrolling".

commands.name: view-current-value
commands.title: View Current Scroll Bars Visibility Value
commands.description: Views current scroll bars visibility value.

scripts.script:build: cd script && swift build -c release --arch arm64 --arch x86_64 && npm run script:move
